page.quote:
We make a living by what
we get, but we make a life by
what we give

story.p: We live in an increasingly busy and hectic society, and this can easily lead to stress. Symptoms can typically manifest themselves via physical or mental ailments. To prevent or reduce stress, people require sufficient time to relax and enjoy activities that help them to maintain balance. By regaining your personal balance, you will be able to get rid of or reduce physical and/or mental ailments.
Balance By Hands offers you the opportunity to make yourself aware of the above-mentioned points, and will help you to regain your personal balance.
Balance By Hands specialises in classic relaxation massage, sport massage, chair massages, hot stone massage en magnetism therapy.
